short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple hijri calendar, now with calendar variants, arabic support and moon phase.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hijri Cal enables users to instantly view the current Hijri date, along with the time and Gregorian date, all in an elegantly designed interface. Now featuring support for the Arabic language, calendar variations, and dynamic moon phases.

Use these keyboard shortcuts to access the extension quickly from any page:

- Command + H for macOS
- Ctrl + Shift + H for Windows and Linux

We welcome your feedback and suggestions!

Thank you.
